title: WhatsApp Business API Setup
subtitle: Follow these steps exactly to activate your account

steps.title: 1. What you NEED now
steps.text:
Do not proceed without these:
• Tax ID and Legal Company Name.
• Phone Number: Must be active to receive SMS/Call, but CANNOT have an active WhatsApp account. If it does, delete it in Settings > Account > Delete my account.
• Credit Card: To register your Meta payment method.

steps.title: 2. Access Meta Business Manager
steps.text:
1. Go to business.facebook.com/overview.
2. Log in or click 'Create account'.
3. Use your real business name and corporate email.

steps.title: 3. Create your Integration App
steps.text:
1. Access the Meta App Dashboard.
2. Click the green 'Create App' button.
3. Choose 'Business' and proceed.
4. Set your company name as the 'Display name'.

steps.title: 4. Add WhatsApp to your App
steps.text:
1. In your app dashboard, scroll down to 'WhatsApp'.
2. Click 'Set up'.
3. Select your Business Account (from step 2) and click continue.

steps.title: 5. Register and Verify Number
steps.text:
1. In the sidebar, click WhatsApp > API Setup.
2. Scroll to 'Step 5' and click 'Add phone number'.
3. Fill in the profile and category.
4. Choose 'Text message (SMS)' to validate.
5. Enter the code you received.

steps.title: 6. DATA TO SEND ME (Final Step)
steps.text:
On the same 'API Setup' screen, copy these 3 items and send them to me:
• Phone Number ID
• WhatsApp Business Account ID
• Temporary Access Token (found at the top).

items.a: Yes, as long as it can receive voice calls for the verification code.
Technical setup is instant. Meta's official verification takes 24h to 48h.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.text: You agree not to send SPAM. Meta may ban numbers that receive multiple user reports.
